channel.title: Homeland
channel.description:
Anyone watch Homeland on Showtime? It's on Sundays, but I haven't actually watched it live. Someone introduced me to it and I quickly obtained every episode up to the most current (Season 2, Ep8).
It's amazing, I'd recommend it! http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Homeland_(TV_series)

item.title: Homeland
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“Fails, post:4, topic:469864”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=587177.msg4167131#msg4167131 date=1353825405]

Introduce him to the Showtime series ‘Dexter’.

He chooses Homeland instead.

:mad:
[/quote]
I watch both Homeland and Dexter every Sunday night, after The Walking Dead.

I recommend them both.[/quote]
Hate the Walking Dead. Ep9 of Homeland was on last night, I’ve heard it was quite good. Obtaining it now.

Read full topic

item.title: Homeland
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

Anyone watch Homeland on Showtime? It’s on Sundays, but I haven’t actually watched it live.
Someone introduced me to it and I quickly obtained every episode up to the most current (Season 2, Ep8).

It’s amazing, I’d recommend it!

en.wikipedia.org

Homeland (TV series)

Homeland is an American spy thriller television series developed by Howard Gordon and Alex Gansa based on the Israeli series Prisoners of War (Original title Hebrew: חטופים‎, translit. Hatufim, literally "Abductees"), which was created by Gideon Raff. The series stars Claire Danes as Carrie Mathison, a Central Intelligence Agency officer with bipolar disorder, and Damian Lewis as Nicholas Brody, a U.S. Marine Corps Scout Sniper. Mathison had come to believe that Brody, who was held captive by al-...
